description:
Stronger than any other girl, Reina has always been ashamed of her strength. With Stony`s consolation and Iota`s help, Reina becomes confident about her power. Communicating through the gauntlet, Iota and Reina become closer to each other. To communicate with Reina, Iota shuts down the communication with Kai and Taff but gets attacked by Cyclo. In order to save Iota, Reina has to fight alone.
Source: Amazon
